properties.name: Organization List
properties.description: The list of organizations the API key provided has access to

properties.name: Meraki API Key
properties.description: Your Meraki API key. This can be generated in your Meraki dashboard

Gets a list of Cisco Meraki organizations that the API key provided has access to.

Target: HTTP Endpoint for "api.meraki.com" with a path of "/api"

Account Key: None (uses an API key)

Steps:
[] Request a list of organizations
[] Check if the request was successful:
[]> If it was, set the output variable
[]> If it wasn't, return an error

More information about this API: https://developer.cisco.com/meraki/api-v1/#!get-organizations
